project.title: IMPSGURU
project.hero_description: A unique and powerful software suite to transform the way you work. Designed for businesses of all sizes, built by a company that values your privacy.

about.title: Focus on members
about.description: We are in this to delight our members. We maintain constant communication to understand their needs and wants.

about.title: Take ownership
about.description: We are passionate and proactive. We take ownership and prioritize the long term, not just our team or task.

about.title: Get stuff done
about.description: Time and resources are a constraint. We can only win if we are faster, more effective, and more agile than others.

about.title: Prioritize data
about.description: We are humble about our opinions and use data across our teams to make better decisions. We have deep respect for the security & privacy of members.

about.title: Enjoy the journey
about.description: We believe we can do our best work by supporting each other and seeking together to make our work engaging, fun, and enjoyable.

about.title: Support personal growth
about.description: We are committed to using our experience at work to support our own and each otherâ€™s personal growth journeys.

hero.title: IMPS GURU Network & Partner program
hero.intro: Join the IMPS GURU Network & Expand your Distributor Business & Earn Extra Income. IMPS GURU has always been Vocal for the Local shopkeepers. Through IMPS GURU, more than 4,00,000 retailers have served around 3 crore unique customers in 2,300+ cities. IMPS GURU has increased retailers monthly earning as well as customer's footfall.

list.title: IMPS GURU for Retails
list.intro: IMPS GURU has always been Vocal for the Local shopkeepers. Through IMPS GURU, more than 4,00,000 retailers have served around 3 crore unique customers in 2,300+ cities. IMPS GURU has increased retailers monthly earning as well as customer's footfall.

list.title: Become a true solution provider
list.intro: Become Aatma nirbhar Dukaandar and earn Rs.16,000 extra every month. Our Platform is Easy, Fast & Secure to use.

list.title: Free of cost services
list.intro: No charges to use IMPS GURU Service. Earn token on every transaction, which helps in boosting their earnings.

list.title: IMPS GURU for Distributors
list.intro: We at IMPS GURU intend to improve our distributors earning potential by enabling them to grow their business and make the best out of their retail network. It will help you make your daily business easy and effective.
